thread.section_title: Starfire Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Starfire Direct | starfiredirect.com
thread.title: Claudia Hauch
thread.title_full: Starfire Direct reviewed by Claudia Hauch

author: Claudia Hauch
title: Claudia Hauch
text: The selection, product, delivery and service were all great! However, we should have called though before purchasing to make sure our fireplace was compatible and should not have gone with the recommendation on several sights regarding how much to buy for our size fireplace. We ended up purchasing 32 lbs but can't use more than 5 lbs for our brand fireplace. Ended up being a very expensive 5 lbs!
